text.text_translated:
Graffiti is writing or pictures on walls.
People painted and wrote on walls for a very long time.
Long ago, people in Africa and Europe used to paint pictures of animals and people.
They painted in caves.
People found graffiti on old buildings.
These buildings were in Greece, Italy, Syria, and Iraq.
There was a Roman town called Pompeii.
In Pompeii, people found many examples of graffiti.
People wrote this graffiti in Latin.
The graffiti had messages about gods, leaders, love, and magic spells.
